verse.name: v1
verse.lines: According to Thy gracious word, In meek humility, This will I do, my dying Lord, I will remember Thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Thy body, broken for my sake, My bread from heaven shall be; Thy testamental cup I take, And thus remember Thee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: When to the cross I turn mine eyes, And rest on Calvary, O Lamb of God, my sacrifice, I must remember Thee.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Remember Thee, and all Thy pains, And all Thy love to me: Yea, while I breathe, a pulse remains Will I remember Thee.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: And when these failing lips grow dumb, And mind and memory flee, When Thou shalt in Thy Kingdom come, Jesus, remember me.
